wkf-model.name: Parallel Sub Process
wkf-model.diagramXml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <bpmn2:definitions xmlns:bpmn2="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:camunda="http://camunda.org/schema/1.0/bpmn" xmlns:bioc="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn/biocolor/1.0" xmlns:color="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/non-normative/color/1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" id="sample-diagram" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" xs:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL BPMN20.xsd" camunda:code="BPM-16" camunda:diagramName="Parallel Sub Process" camunda:wkfStatusColor="blue" camunda:appBuilder="BPM-16"> <bpmn2:process id="Process_Parallel_SubProcess" name="Parallel Sub Process" isExecutable="true" camunda:versionTag=""> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:processConfiguration> <camunda:processConfigurationParameter metaModel="Expense" metaModelLabel="Expense (Expense)" isStartModel="true" model="com.axelor.apps.hr.db.Expense" metaModelFullName="com.axelor.apps.hr.db.Expense" title="Expense" /> <camunda:processConfigurationParameter metaModel="ExpenseLine" metaModelLabel="ExpenseLine (Expense line)" isStartModel="false" model="com.axelor.apps.hr.db.ExpenseLine" metaModelFullName="com.axelor.apps.hr.db.ExpenseLine" title="Expense line" /> </camunda:processConfiguration> </bpmn2:extensionElements> <bpmn2:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Start"> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_0hrb6ve</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:startEvent> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_0hrb6ve" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="Activity_0gbzeli" /> <bpmn2:userTask id="Activity_0gbzeli" name="Draft" camunda:completedIf="expense?.statusSelect != 1" camunda:completedIfValue="[{"metaModalName":"Expense","metaModalType":"metaModel","rules":[{"id":0,"parentId":-1,"combinator":"and","rules":[{"fieldName":"statusSelect","operator":"!=","fieldValue":"1","fieldValue2":null,"isRelationalValue":null,"relatedValueFieldName":null,"relatedValueModal":null,"fieldType":"INTEGER","field":{"readonly":true,"selection":"hrs.expenses.status.select","defaultValue":1,"name":"statusSelect","selectionList":[{"value":"1","icon":null,"color":null,"order":0,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Draft"},{"value":"2","icon":null,"color":null,"order":1,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Waiting validation"},{"value":"3","icon":null,"color":null,"order":2,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Validated"},{"value":"4","icon":null,"color":null,"order":3,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Reimbursed"},{"value":"5","icon":null,"color":null,"order":4,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Refused"},{"value":"6","icon":null,"color":null,"order":5,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Canceled"}],"type":"INTEGER","title":"Status"},"isShow":false,"allField":[{"readonly":true,"selection":"hrs.expenses.status.select","defaultValue":1,"name":"statusSelect","selectionList":[{"value":"1","icon":null,"color":null,"order":0,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Draft"},{"value":"2","icon":null,"color":null,"order":1,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Waiting validation"},{"value":"3","icon":null,"color":null,"order":2,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Validated"},{"value":"4","icon":null,"color":null,"order":3,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Reimbursed"},{"value":"5","icon":null,"color":null,"order":4,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Refused"},{"value":"6","icon":null,"color":null,"order":5,"hidden":false,"data":null,"title":"Canceled"}],"type":"INTEGER","title":"Status"}]}]}]}]" camunda:completedIfCombinator="and"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_0hrb6ve</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_0tvsxov</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:userTask> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_0tvsxov" sourceRef="Activity_0gbzeli" targetRef="Activity_14a4c31" /> <bpmn2:subProcess id="Activity_14a4c31" name="Validate lines"> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:properties /> </bpmn2:extensionElements> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_0tvsxov</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_04enipm</bpmn2:outgoing> <bpmn2:multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics camunda:collection="${getIdList(expense.generalExpenseLineList)}" camunda:elementVariable="expenseLineId" /> <bpmn2:startEvent id="Event_1yhmjj3" name="Line start"> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_06yluit</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:startEvent> <bpmn2:userTask id="Activity_0q9d9jn" name="Validate line" camunda:metaModel="ExpenseLine" camunda:metaModelModelName="com.axelor.apps.hr.db.ExpenseLine" camunda:metaModelLabel="Expense line" camunda:completedIf="$ctx.find('ExpenseLine', expenseLineId)?.totalAmount > 50" camunda:completedIfValue="[{"metaModalName":"ExpenseLine","metaModalType":"metaModel","rules":[{"id":0,"parentId":-1,"combinator":"and","rules":[{"fieldName":"totalAmount","operator":">","fieldValue":50,"fieldValue2":null,"isRelationalValue":null,"relatedValueFieldName":null,"relatedValueModal":null,"fieldType":"DECIMAL","field":{"defaultValue":"0","name":"totalAmount","type":"DECIMAL","title":"Total amount with tax","required":true},"isShow":false,"allField":[{"defaultValue":"0","name":"totalAmount","type":"DECIMAL","title":"Total amount with tax","required":true}]}]}],"generateWithId":true}]" camunda:completedIfCombinator="and"> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:properties> <camunda:property name="model" value="com.axelor.apps.hr.db.Expense" /> <camunda:property name="modelName" value="Expense" /> <camunda:property name="modelLabel" value="Expense" /> <camunda:property name="modelType" value="metaModel" /> <camunda:property name="view" value="expense-form" /> <camunda:property name="viewLabel" value="Expense" /> <camunda:property name="item" value="generalExpenseLineList" /> <camunda:property name="itemLabel" value="General expense lines" /> <camunda:property name="permanent" value="false" /> <camunda:property name="readonly" value="false" /> </camunda:properties> </bpmn2:extensionElements> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_06yluit</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_1bkjc9k</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:userTask> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_06yluit" sourceRef="Event_1yhmjj3" targetRef="Activity_0q9d9jn" /> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1bkjc9k" sourceRef="Activity_0q9d9jn" targetRef="Activity_0jtd2d2" /> <bpmn2:endEvent id="Event_0qrnwk6" name="Line end"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_1j76608</bpmn2:incoming> </bpmn2:endEvent> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1j76608" sourceRef="Activity_0jtd2d2" targetRef="Event_0qrnwk6" /> <bpmn2:scriptTask id="Activity_0jtd2d2" name="Update to invoice" scriptFormat="axelor" camunda:scriptValue="{"fields":[{"dataPath":"[20]","type":"BOOLEAN","value":{"selected":{"value":true},"from":"none"},"name":"toInvoice"}],"targetModel":"ExpenseLine","sourceModel":null,"newRecord":false,"createVariable":false,"isJson":false}"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_1bkjc9k</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_1j76608</bpmn2:outgoing> <bpmn2:script>def rec = $ctx.find('ExpenseLine',expenseLineId) rec.toInvoice = true return $ctx.save(rec)</bpmn2:script> </bpmn2:scriptTask> </bpmn2:subProcess> <bpmn2:endEvent id="Event_1q1wryi" name="End"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_04enipm</bpmn2:incoming> </bpmn2:endEvent> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_04enipm" sourceRef="Activity_14a4c31" targetRef="Event_1q1wryi" /> </bpmn2:process> <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1"> <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_1" bpmnElement="Process_Parallel_SubProcess"> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_04enipm_di" bpmnElement="Flow_04enipm" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="1140" y="300" /> <di:waypoint x="1252" y="300" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_0tvsxov_di" bpmnElement="Flow_0tvsxov" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="420" y="280" /> <di:waypoint x="540" y="280" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_0hrb6ve_di" bpmnElement="Flow_0hrb6ve" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="268" y="280" /> <di:waypoint x="320" y="280" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2" bpmnElement="StartEvent_1" bioc:stroke="#55c041" bioc:fill="#ccecc6" color:background-color="#ccecc6" width="36" height="36" /> <bpmndi:BPMNLabel> <dc:Bounds x="562" y="325" width="46" height="14" /> </bpmndi:BPMNLabel> </bpmndi:BPMNShape> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Activity_1lf2fe1_di"
